**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [The Beast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2291) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 212 **Perception** +19; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18 **Str** +7 **Dex** +3 **Con** +6 **Int** -4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +16 **Will** +19 **HP** 120 --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** talon +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** beak +21, **Damage** 2d12+10 piercing **Bloodcurdling Screech** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an 80-foot emanation must attempt a DC 25 Will save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Failure** The creature is [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Critical Failure** The creature is fleeing for 1 round and [frightened 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). **Gnaw** **Requirements** The owlbear has a creature grabbed with its talons. **Effect** The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak Strike. If the Strike hits, the target must attempt a DC 28 Will save.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
**Failure** The target is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) as long as it remains [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). **Screeching Advance** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and Strides twice. All creatures within 80 feet of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.
